segments.text: Good afternoon . Thank you for the opportunity to interview for this position .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hello , have a seat . I â€™ m Bill Gotcha . I am assuming you found your way here with no trouble ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Actually , I am very familiar with the area so there was absolutely no problem .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am curious as to why you want to leave your current employer .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am interested in switching fields .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you feel that you are exceptionally good at anything in particular .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am good at pulling together teams of people to accomplish a task .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What are you not good at ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am impatient with myself at times and am hard on myself .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We appreciate hearing that about you !
segments.speaker: S2
